short_description: Lightweight Long Lasting Setting Spray: Get that just applied makeup look all day long with this makeup extender Setting Spray; It sets makeup in place and prevents it from smudging or settling into fine lines; No more midday makeup touch ups needed
Works with All Skin Types: This formula is lightweight, oil free, non comedogenic and dermatologist tested

Build Your Routine: We have all you need for your beauty routine; Foundation and BB creams for a even finish, highlighter to illuminate your look, concealer to hide imperfections, contour to create definition and blush for a added color

All Things Beauty: Keep your beauty stash stocked with the best; We have a variety of products to help you achieve any look - whether you need eye makeup for a killer cat eye or face makeup for a flawless complexion

product_description: Keep your makeup looking “just applied” all day: no melting, fading or touch-ups necessary. L'Oreal Paris Infallible Pro-Spray + Set Makeup Setting Spray is a non-comodegenic makeup extender setting spray that locks in your total makeup look, Face, Eyes, and Lips, preventing color from smudging or settling into fine lines for all-day staying power. • All day makeup lock-in • Lightweight mist, barely there feel • All day wear, no touch-ups • The pro look of longwear Pro-tip: Shake well. Hold 8”-10” away, close eyes and spray 4 to 6 times in an X & T motion. Avoid spraying in eyes. Caution: Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame or heat. Avoid spraying in eyes.

name: Revolution, Superfix Hydra Cool Prep + Fix Continuous Fixing Mist, Hydrating Face Spray for Makeup, Infused with Aloe Vera, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 5.7 oz
short_description: PREP, SET, REFRESH: Our Superfix Misting Makeup Setting Spray just got an upgrade! The Revolution Superfix Hydra Cool Mist preps, sets and refreshes your face throughout the day with an innovative cooling formula
DEWY FINISHING FORMULA: This spray is packed full of skin-loving ingredients to cool and hydrate the skin. Infused with Aloe Vera to soothe and moisturize and coconut water to hydrate and refresh
LONG-LASTING & QUICK DRY: Dries down in 3-seconds, locking face makeup in place for 24-hours, all while giving a dewy and refreshing finish to the skin

HOW TO USE: Apply without makeup or apply over liquid, cream and powder products. After base application, hold the spray away from your face and spritz a light mist for a dewy and hydrated finish. Re-apply whenever you want that refreshing feel
CRUELTY-FREE & VEGAN: This Revolution product is formulated without any animal-derived ingredients making it Vegan friendly. All Revolution products are backed by PETA as being Animal Test Free
product_description: The Revolution Superfix Hydra Cool Mist preps, sets and refreshes your face throughout the day with a innovative cooling formula. KEY BENEFITS: • Enriched with aloe vera, coconut water & hydroviton plus. • Dries down in 3-seconds, locking in makeup in place for 24hrs*. • Gives a dewy & refreshing finish to the skin. FORMULA: Enriched with aloe vera, coconut water & hydroviton plus. HOW TO USE: The Revolution Superfix Misting Hydra Cool Mist can be applied without makeup or over liquid, cream and powder products. After you have applied your base, hold the spray around 4in (10cm) away from your face and spritz a light mist for a dewy and hydrated finish. Re-apply whenever you want that refreshing feel. Vegan & Cruelty Free. *Tested on 57 consumers over 1 week.

name: e.l.f. Makeup Mist & Set - Large Lightweight, Long Lasting, All-Day Wear Revitalizes, Refreshes, Hydrates, Soothes Infused with Aloe, Green Tea and Cucumber 4 Fl Oz
short_description: SPRAY FOR GRIPPING MAKEUP: The ultimate must-have lasting makeup setting spray! The e.l.f. Makeup Mist & Set Spray is designed to hold your face and eye makeup in place all day and to revitalize makeup color with just a few sprays.
SOOTHING & HYDRATING FORMULA: The formula contains aloe, green tea, cucumber, and vitamins A, C, and E to soothe and hydrate the skin. Great for all skin types.
HOW TO USE: Hold the bottle at arm’s length and spray a light layer of facial mist over your makeup with eyes closed. Let the formula dry naturally or blot with a tissue to help speed dry.

BEAUTY TIP: Prior to application of products on your sponge or brush, spray your tool with the Makeup Mist & Set for extended product staying powder and more vibrant color. Your highlighters, foundation and powders will never be the same!

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: e.l.f. stands with every eye, lip, face, paw and fin. Proudly vegan, e.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETA. e.l.f. brushes are synthetic, vegan & cruelty-free.

After applying makeup, mist the lightweight formula over your face to keep your makeup from running or fading, control shine, and refresh your look throughout the day. Plus, it's infused with skin-loving vitamins B & E plus Arctium Majus Root to deliver hydrating and soothing benefits for healthy-looking skin.
